vote.title: Appointment of Greg Corbin, Associate Director of Lincoln Theatre, of 137 Nicole Drive, Westerville, OH 43081 to serve on the Columbus Arts Commission replacing Diane Nance fulfilling the remaining current term from 07/31/2021 with an expiration date of 07/31/2026 (résumé attached).
vote.description:
Title
 
Appointment of Greg Corbin, Associate Director of Lincoln Theatre, of 137 Nicole Drive, Westerville, OH 43081 to serve on the Columbus Arts Commission replacing Diane Nance fulfilling the remaining current term from 07/31/2021 with an expiration date of 07/31/2026 (résumé attached).
